about-dialog.license-text-license: GNU Affero General Public License, Version 3
about-dialog.issues-text: If something does not work or you have a suggestion for improvement, please report on the {{tracker}}.
about-dialog.help-text: If you have a question, please have a look at the {{documentation}}, raise a question in the {{discussions}} or ask in the {{chat}}.
about-dialog.map-data-geoip-description: This product includes GeoLite2 data created by MaxMind, available from {{maxmind}}.

client-provider.disconnected: The connection to the server was lost. Trying to reconnect…

edit-filter-dialog.title: Filter
edit-filter-dialog.introduction: Here you can set an advanced expression to show/hide certain markers/lines based on their attributes. The filter expression only applies to your view of the map, but it can be persisted as part of a saved view or a shared link.
edit-filter-dialog.data-description-2: For checkbox fields, the value is {{uncheckedValue}} (unchecked) or {{checkedValue}} (checked).

edit-type-dialog.delete-field-message: Do you really want to delete the field “{{fieldName}}”?
edit-type-dialog.field-disappeared-error: The field cannot be found on the type anymore.
edit-type-dialog.unique-field-name-error: Multiple fields cannot have the same name.
edit-type-dialog.title: Edit Type
edit-type-dialog.name: Name
edit-type-dialog.styles-introduction: These styles are applied when a new object of this type is created. If “Fixed” is enabled, the style is applied to all objects of this type and cannot be changed for an individual object anymore. For more complex style control, dropdown or checkbox fields can be configured below to change the style based on their selected value.
edit-type-dialog.show-in-legend-description: An item for this type will be shown in the legend. Any fixed style attributes are applied to it. Dropdown or checkbox fields that control the style generate additional legend items.

edit-type-dropdown-dialog.delete-option-message: Do you really want to delete the option “{{value}}”?
edit-type-dropdown-dialog.unique-value-error: Multiple options cannot have the same label.
edit-type-dropdown-dialog.no-options-error: Controlling fields need to have at least one option.
edit-type-dropdown-dialog.label: Label (for legend)

history-dialog.title: History
history-dialog.introduction: Here you can inspect and revert the last 50 changes to the map.

history-utils.revert-create-marker-message-named: Do you really want to delete the marker {{quotedName}}?
history-utils.revert-create-marker-message-unnamed: Do you really want to delete this marker?

history-utils.revert-update-type-message-unnamed: Do you really want to restore the old version of this type?
history-utils.revert-delete-marker-message-named: Do you really want to restore the marker {{quotedName}}?

user-preferences-dialog.title: User preferences
user-preferences-dialog.introduction: These settings are stored on your computer as a cookie and are applied independently of the opened map.
